message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. If you're willing to meet me halfway, I'd be happy to consider it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,500 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $11,000.
